name: Hoarfrost Drake
description: The Hoarfrost Drake is a medium-sized dragon with a chaotic evil nature, characterized by its icy breath and sharp claws. It embodies the dangers of cold environments and has distinctive icy scales.
memorable: Its ability to create a cloud of freezing fog makes it a formidable foe that can control the battlefield.
goals: Typically serves as a menace in icy locales, posing a threat to adventurers.
relations: Often found in the company of cold-themed creatures or other evil dragons.
environment: Commonly inhabits icy regions and snowy terrains.
strengths: Immunity to cold damage and special abilities to traverse icy surfaces effortlessly.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to fire damage, which poses a significant risk during encounters.
attacks: Employs a multiattack with one bite dealing piercing and cold damage, alongside slashing damage from claws.
most_powerful_ability: Cloud of Riming Ice creates difficult terrain and inflicts cold damage, while potentially causing creatures to drop their items.
skills: Possesses good skills in perception and stealth, allowing it to detect threats and navigate undetected.
additional_information: The Ice Walk ability allows movement across icy surfaces without penalty.
Icy Scales grants advantage on escape from grapples.
The Passive Perception of 13 helps it notice hidden threats.
Retaliatory Slip enables it to escape grapples and counter with a bite.
The creature's chaotic evil nature makes it a treacherous opponent.
